General.Name: InBankshares Corp
General.Description: InBankshares, Corp provides a range of banking and mortgage services to individual and business customers. It provides business and personal checking and savings accounts, as well as credit cards. The company also offers business lending, including equipment term, owner occupied real estate, small business administration, investor real estate, and construction loans, as well working capital lines of credit. In addition, it provides personal lending services, such as vehicle, residential construction, and lot loans, as well as home equity lines of credit; merchant services; and treasury management services comprising payments, receivables, fraud protection, and online and mobile banking. The company was formerly known as FFP Group, Inc. InBankshares, Corp was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Greenwood Village, Colorado.
General.Address: 6380 South Fiddlers Green Circle, Greenwood Village, CO, United States, 80111
